name: chatgpt-autocomment
description: Pulsar package: right-click selected code to auto-insert comments using the OpenAI API.

model.title: OpenAI model
model.description: Model to use for comment generation.

apiBaseUrl.title: OpenAI API base URL
apiBaseUrl.description: Leave default unless you are using a proxy.

requestTimeoutMs.title: Request timeout (ms)
requestTimeoutMs.description: How long to wait before aborting the request.

maxSelectionChars.title: Max selection size (characters)
maxSelectionChars.description: Prevent accidentally sending huge selections. The plugin will refuse if the selection is larger than this.

showStatusBarProgress.title: Show status bar progress
showStatusBarProgress.description: Show a live timer in the status bar while the request runs.
